name: AVAssetResourceLoadingDataRequest
desc: An object for requesting data from a resource that an asset resource-loading request references.

items.name: func respond(with: Data)
items.desc: Provides data to the loading request.

items.name: var requestedLength: Int
items.desc: The length, in bytes, of the data requested.

items.name: var requestedOffset: Int64
items.desc: The position within the resource of the first byte requested.

items.name: var currentOffset: Int64
items.desc: The position within the resource of the next byte.

items.name: var requestsAllDataToEndOfResource: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates the entire remaining length of the resource from the offest to the end of the resource is being requested.
